010-00705-06.productName: Compact Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot Starter Pack
010-00705-06.globalProductName: Compact Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot Starter Pack
010-00705-06.pvName: Compact Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot Starter Pack

seo.title: Garmin Compact Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot Pack
seo.ogDescription: The Compact Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot Pack is an entry-level autopilot system that is for single-engine outboard boats less than 30’ long.

defaultImage.altTag: Compact Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot Starter Pack

overviewTab.title: Overview

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
• Reactor 40 CCU (Course Computer Unit)
  • 1.0 L Pump
  • ECU (Electronic Control Unit)
  • ECU power cable
  • Interconnect cable
  • Buzzer
  • NMEA 2000® drop cables (2 meters)
  • NMEA 2000 power cable
  • NMEA 2000 T-connectors
  • Male and female terminators
  • Documentation

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
• Unit dimensions, WxHxD: 4.3 " x 4.4 " x 1.9 " (10.9 x 11.2 x 4.8 cm)
  • Pump dimensions, LxWxH: 6.6 " x 3.9 " x 3.3 " (16.8 x 10.0 x 8.5 cm)
  • NMEA output: NMEA 2000
  • Supply voltage: 10V to 20V
  • Operating temperature: -15° C to 70 C° (5° F to 158° F)

GHC 20 Specifications

productEmsList.tooltip:
GHC autopilot instrument is included with GHC selection. If you select "None Included," it is the Reactor 40 product only. 

Shadow Drive automatically disengages the autopilot if the helm is turned.
productEmsList.title: GHC™ Autopilot Instrument
